description:
Their BERRINO PANTS for men are functional all-rounder for days of ski touring enjoyment when less is more.

With its ribbed inner structure, Tasmanian merino wool ensures excellent insulation and feels pleasant on the skin. On the outside, the lightweight softshell pants offer scuff resistance and protection against wind and weather. Their athletic cut and elastic two-way stretch material mean they adapt to your every move.

The softshell pants boast functional details such as adjustable ankle cuffs and abrasion-resistant SCHOELLER fabric in high-stress areas to protect against sharp edges – not to mention a clean, puristic look.

BERRINO PANTS for men are tailored for a perfect fit and are reliable all-rounders for pure ski touring enjoyment.
name: Ortovox Berrino Pants, Reg - Mens
